extendedInfo.description: Dream Team Euro 2012 Fantasy Football By News International Ltd. Download The Sunâs Â£200,000 Euro 2012 Dream Team App for FREE and compete for tons of cash prizes. **** Please note. Free entry is now closed on the app and web. If you have already registered your free team, simply log in. **** Our Euro 2012 Dream Team App will let you manage a team of Europeâs finest competing at this summerâs championships, make in-tournament transfers as well as join or create a Mini League to compete against your friends and family if you like that extra competitive edge to your Fantasy Football. Your chosen fantasy XI will gain or lose points based on their appearances in Euro 2012. Points are scored depending on how your players perform for their country in their matches. Keep up with all the latest game stats throughout the tournament to help guide you with your big decisions as well as all the latest news from Dream Team HQ with player ratings and Twitter updates from @dreamteamfc.

reviews.title: Rubish
reviews.comment: Once downloaded and installed. Not once have i been able to access it constant server error try latter.  Have tried at 2,3,4 am and every hour from 9am through to midnight. Server error try later. Dont bother dowloading it. Unistalling it now
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Infuriating
reviews.comment: Trying to submit my team and it keeps saying downloading data, been downloading data for a solid hour now

reviews.title: Needs work!

reviews.comment: I never selected my team on the app before so players missing doesnt matter to me. Quite surprised with it after the last one but might be speaking to soon lol

reviews.comment: Stupid I\'m not included in the league\'s can\'t even choose my own team name fuck off
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: At least it works this time.
reviews.comment: The premier league app never worked for me. This time looks good. U still can\'t see you fellow mini leaguers teams. Would be nice to see them to compare.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absolute Rubbish
reviews.comment: Just downloaded app to join a mates league, had all correct info to do so and when prompted to confirm it comes up with \"error\" team cannot join league! Uninstalled it now. Don\'t waste your time and space on your phone, worst app ever for it\'s size expected better. One saving grace it was free!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic fun
reviews.comment: Really enjoyed using this app. Has worked perfectly Never entered a dt before, however as this was so accessible thought why not? Player ratings are a bit random and prices seem a little lose, but outweighted by all the great features. The only real important would be if the people rating the players actually watched the game, rather than randomly allocating numbers to players they know. adds a new dimension to the champs. \'Sun produces something that isnt rubbish shock!\' Thanks sun!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: For all you idiots the Euros is over!\nIts been brilliant using this app on android & iOS (ipad)\nWould be nice to have a WP7 app for next 12/13 season!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Works ok. Frustrating to create and save team initially. Disappointed you cant see transfers or teams for others in mini league. However basics are all there and handy to check on the go.
